DataElement.preferredName: Sexual Health Inventory for Men Total Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Number representation for the sum of scores for the questions in the Sexual Health Inventory for Men.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Sexual Health Inventory for Men Total Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
